mechanics.condition: Target object has a single break or tear AND the break or tear is no longer than 1 foot in any dimension
mechanics.outcome: The single break or tear is repaired, leaving no trace of former damage

mechanics.trigger: On cast, targeting a magic item or construct
mechanics.condition: Target is a magic item OR construct
mechanics.outcome: Physical damage is repaired, BUT any lost magic or magical properties are NOT restored

description_text: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no longer than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage. This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.
